content.title: Renal Artery Aneurysm
content.description: Aneurysms of the renal artery and its branches

key_concepts.details: Low for small (<2cm); increased in pregnancy, women of childbearing age
>2cm, women of childbearing age, symptomatic, rapid growth

content.clinical_significance: Special consideration needed for women planning pregnancy

primary_sources: Henke PK et al. J Vasc Surg 2001
